sentences.sContent: Go and open the oval box on the sofa.
sentences.sContent_eng: Go and open the oval box on the sofa.
sentences.sCn: 去并打开在沙发上的椭圆形的盒子。

sentences.sContent: Some of them are square, and some maybe oval.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some of them are square, and some maybe oval.
sentences.sCn: 有些是方形的，还有些可能是椭圆形的。
